name: Beach Clean up
task: Head to the nearest beach and clean up some marine debris.  Every action counts!  When you complete the mssion, come back here to log your efforts.

name: Recycle
task: Go and recycle things like plastic bottles.

name: Add a Species Profile
task: Go to the Learn section and add a species profile!

name: Find microplastics
task: Head to the beach and search the sand for the hidden microplastics
